name: Toxic Wasteland: Mutant Hunter
description:
Cold war on the globe has ended with a nuclear war, the Third World War, and brought the apocalypse on us all - men and women, plants, animals, natural and human-made world! It was undoubtedly a huge disaster, the biggest ever seen! Calamity, disaster, tragedy, catastrophe - no word does the justice to show the scale of the damage!
The global conflict has ended eventually, yet civilization is now left in the state of crisis. Due to the nuclear fallout a new problem emerged - mutants. They are mindless nasty creatures seeking out healthy people and their flesh as there’s scarcely any food, not even a deer, rabbit or a duck...
And there’s the last hope we, the people, have - YOU, a sole savior! A vagabond who left the survivors’ shelter to traverse through the devastated landscape of what used to be our civilization. Mad mutants are scattered throughout the world. Eliminate your enemies with a bow and sharp arrows. Polish your skills in archery and kill the monsters even faster, aim to be an epic solo ranger - mutant hunter! Remember, you are alone, you don’t have your own division of soldiers. Feel the real solitude in these wastelands.

Grab your bow, sharp your arrow and go for a hunt. It’s hunt or be hunted. Don’t let the humankind go extinct. Fight for your life! Fight for the life of us all!

Toxic wasteland mutant hunter is a video game offering you intuitive controls, mind-blowing 3d graphics, huge skill cap, thrilling and fast-paced action! Toxic wasteland mutant hunter is completely free to play. You don’t even need an internet connection to play the game!
Fun fact - This wonderful game features a New York city (NYC) borderlands.

Toxic wasteland mutant hunter has a ranking, so aim for the top and be a champion of humankind! See who’s the best sole survivor amongst all the gamers of the world!

If you are tired of “zombie bow shooting games” then you should definitely play this wonderful game!

Here is a long list of what the game offers:

-Different environments: apocalyptic city, annihilated village, devastated farm and contaminated suburbs.
-You can use a longbow with sharp arrows.
Shooting mutants in the head is more efficient.
-Survival mode (defend the spot, protect the Survivor).
-Hunter mode (hit the Boss-Monster).
-Achievements to earn.
-Leaderboards - you can compete with your friends, make it to the top completely by yourself!
-Wind factor! Arrows actually turn - take the wind into account.
-Featuring New York city borderlands.
-Free to play! No money needed!

How to play this awesome free game:

Tap to stretch the bow.
Aim at the target (hit the head for more points!).
Bow reloads automatically.
Bow will start shaking when stretched for too long!
Don’t get killed, you’re the last hope of the mankind!

Good luck and have fun hunting (from Play Cool Zombie Sport Games)!

Play offline, no internet connection is needed to play!
